name: SYNTRAN® PUC 9202
description:
SYNTRAN® PUC 9202 is a cationic, aqueous polyester-type aliphatic polyurethane dispersion, offering excellent compatibility with and good adhesion to inorganic substrates, pigments, and functional plastics like polycarbonate. SYNTRAN® PUC 9202 is a self-emulsifying one-component system that shows no migration phenomena because it contains no surfactants.

Features and Benefits:


	Good adhesion and high gloss
	Excellent compatibility with inorganic substances
	Excellent resistance to water and alkali and good weather resistance
	Easy film formation at relatively low temperature
	Good storage stability with good rheology
	One-component aliphatic polyurethane, low molecular weight, excellent compatibility with our cationic acrylic emulsions.
